short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple play/pause hotkey (Alt+P) for Audible. This button allows to pause or resume current book independently of current tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple play/pause hotkey (Alt+P) for Audible. This button allows to pause or resume current book independently of current tab.

It currently will only work with audible.com (not audible.co.uk, I'll fix it in the future)
